overview: Live at Akasaka Blitz 28th, 29th August, 2003.  Japanese exclusive jam session by four guitar greats, Paul Gilbert, Nuno Bettencourt, Steve Hackett, & John Paul Jones. The DVD (NTSC / Region 0) features individual segments by each of the artists as well as a collective 'Acoustic Set' & a 'Encore'.
title: Guitar Wars
